columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.Customer_name: The full name of the customer.

Customers.table_description: The table stores customer information for the insurance process.

columns.Service_ID: The unique identifier for each service.
columns.Service_name: The name of the service offered.

Services.table_description: The table catalogs services provided in the insurance sector.

columns.FNOL_ID: The unique identifier for each First Notification of Loss.
columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for the associated customer.
columns.Policy_ID: The unique identifier for the associated insurance policy.
columns.Service_ID: The unique identifier for the provided service.

First_Notification_of_Loss.table_description: The table records first notifications of loss for insurance claims.

columns.Claim_ID: The unique identifier for each insurance claim.
columns.FNOL_ID: The unique identifier for the associated First Notification of Loss.
columns.Effective_Date: The date when the claim becomes effective.

Claims.table_description: The table tracks insurance claims linked to notifications of loss.

columns.Settlement_ID: The unique identifier for each settlement record.
columns.Claim_ID: The unique identifier for the associated insurance claim.
columns.Effective_Date: The date when the settlement takes effect.
columns.Settlement_Amount: The monetary value of the settlement agreed upon.

Settlements.table_description: The table records settlement details related to insurance claims.

columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.Policy_ID: The unique identifier for each insurance policy.
columns.Date_Opened: The date when the insurance policy was initiated.
columns.Date_Closed: The date when the insurance policy was terminated.

Customers_Policies.table_description: The table manages relationships between customers and their insurance policies.

columns.Policy_ID: The unique identifier for each available insurance policy.
columns.policy_type_code: The type of insurance policy offered to customers.
columns.Customer_Phone: The contact number for customers associated with the policy.

Available_Policies.table_description: The table lists all available insurance policies and their details.
